00019 #include "DataGroupHeaderWriter.h"
00020 #include "FileOutput.h"
00021 
00022 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00023 
00024 DataGroupHeaderWriter::DataGroupHeaderWriter()
00025 {
00026         dataSetPos = 0; 
00027         nextDataGroupPos = 0;
00028 }
00029 
00030 void DataGroupHeaderWriter::Write(std::ofstream &os, const DataGroupHeader &dc)
00031 {
00032         WriteNextDataGroupPos(os, 0);
00033         WriteDataSetPos(os, 0);
00034         WriteDataSetCnt(os, dc);
00035         WriteName(os, dc);
00036 }
00037 
00038 void DataGroupHeaderWriter::WriteDataSetPos(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t pos)
00039 {
00040         dataSetPos = os.tellp();
00041         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, pos);
00042 }
00043 
00044 void DataGroupHeaderWriter::UpdateDataSetPos(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t pos) const
00045 {
00046         if(dataSetPos > 0) 
00047         {
00048                 os.seekp(dataSetPos, std::ios::beg);
00049                 FileOutput::WriteUInt32(os, pos);
00050                 os.seekp(pos, std::ios::beg);
00051         }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void DataGroupHeaderWriter::WriteNextDataGroupPos(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t pos)
00055 {
00056         nextDataGroupPos = os.tellp();
00057         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, pos);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void DataGroupHeaderWriter::UpdateNextDataGroupPos(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t pos) const
00061 {
00062         if(nextDataGroupPos > 0) 
00063         {
00064                 os.seekp(nextDataGroupPos, std::ios::beg);
00065                 FileOutput::WriteUInt32(os, pos);
00066                 os.seekp(pos, std::ios::beg);
00067         }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void DataGroupHeaderWriter::WriteName(std::ofstream &os, const DataGroupHeader &dc) const
00071 {
00072         FileOutput::WriteString16(os, dc.GetName());
00073 }
00074 
00075 void DataGroupHeaderWriter::WriteDataSetCnt(std::ofstream &os, const DataGroupHeader &dc) const
00076 {
00077         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, dc.GetDataSetCnt());
00078 }
